channel.title: vinyl on alexchiri.com

item.title: More or less
item.description: A bit of history I started using my parents old russian vinyl player when I was a bit older than 3 years old (or so I was told). We had a few tens of vinyls, most of them ‘classics’ like Harry Belafonte, Elton John, Roxette, Abba and a bunch of children stories recorded for the radio, sometime in the ‘60s or ‘70s. You could guess which were my favorites at that time, I knew them by heart and a day wouldn't pass without the player ‘booming’ with children stories.
